editors.item:
If you want to edit this document, follow below instruction: 1. Create a new \
(or replace this \
if you are the first editor) and replace the value inside it as defined on instruction #2. 2. Copy and paste structure inside authors -> prime inside your \
.

octapushJSDocumentation.description: Check the `obj` is an Array or not.

return.description: Return `TRUE` if the `obj` is an array. Otherwise is `FALSE`

item.codes: var data = 'my name is Fadhly Permata'.split(''); console.log(_o_.compare.isArray(data));
